name: Slime fly to the sky
description:
Slime Fly to the Sky

You are a slime who wants to fly to the sky.

But you have no wings, so you have to shoot yourself to the sky.

Absorb other slimes,  avoid spikes and go up as much as you can!

Careful Not to use all your jelly, or you will explode

Controls:

touch to jump.

long touch to jump longer.

lose jelly when jumping midair(midair long  jump spends 2 jellies).

Asset Used:

Platform tiles from:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer

BGM from:

https://opengameart.org/content/generic-8-bit-jrpg-soundtrack

Sound Effects from:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets?q=audio

The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection (By Juhani Junkala)

this game is made for 3 days for ScoreSpace Jam #20, using LootLocker to use Scoreboard.
